quotes.message: Once GNU is written, everyone will be able to obtain good system software free, just like air.
I bless your computer, my child!
I've always lived cheaply. I live like a student, basically. And I like that, because it means that money is not telling me what to do. I can do what I think is important for me to do.

Proprietary software tends to have malicious features. The point is with a proprietary program, when the users don't have the source code, we can never tell. So you must consider every proprietary program as potential malware.
Facebook is not your friend, it is a surveillance engine.
One reason you should not use web applications to do your computing is that you lose control.
He is the richest who is content with the least.
In the free/libre software movement, we develop software that respects users'freedom, so we and you can escape from software that doesn't.
